lines.text: if a + b * c greater than max1 then set max1 to a + b * c
lines.code: if ( a + b * c > max1 ) { max1 = a + b * c ; }

lines.text: if a * ( b + c ) greater than max1 then set max1 to a * ( b + c )

lines.text: if a * b * c greater than max1 then set max1 to a * b * c
lines.code: if ( a + b + c > max1 ) { max1 = a + b + c ; }
